MooseX::Getopt::OptionTypeMap(3pm) User Contributed Perl Documentation MooseX::Getopt::OptionTypeMap(3pm)

NAME

MooseX::Getopt::OptionTypeMap - Storage for the option to type mappings

VERSION

version 0.74

DESCRIPTION

See the Custom Type Constraints section in the MooseX::Getopt docs for more info about how to use this module.

METHODS

has_option_type ($type_or_name)

get_option_type ($type_or_name)

add_option_type_to_map ($type_name, $option_spec)

SUPPORT

Bugs may be submitted through the RT bug tracker <https://rt.cpan.org/Public/Dist/Display.html?Name=MooseX-Getopt> (or bug-MooseX-Getopt@rt.cpan.org <mailto:bug-MooseX-Getopt@rt.cpan.org>).

There is also a mailing list available for users of this distribution, at <http://lists.perl.org/list/moose.html>.

There is also an irc channel available for users of this distribution, at "#moose" on "irc.perl.org" <irc://irc.perl.org/#moose>.
